name: City Parrot Simulator 3D
description:
Follow the wind towards the big city and fly between the skyscrapers and large buildings as a fugitive pet with City Parrot Simulator 3D!
Get ready for the ultimate macaw parrot simulator! Search for food, fight against other city birds and predators, meet other parrots to join your flock, raise up nestlings and fly over the city streets! Spread your wings and fly in the sky – raise up the perfect city bird from ex-pet with City Parrot Simulator 3D game!
Beware the city predators – cats and eagles – they can attack from ambush at any moment! Meet other city birds – pigeons, crows, even seagulls – and fight for food against them! Maintain health, hunger and energy rate to set up a flock of parrots with this bird survival simulator in 3D!
Explore the sky above the city streets and blocks, avoid being a prey and survive at all costs! Earn points for winning in fights, completing missions or just successful throwing own crap to the humans! Use earned points to level up your parrot, buy new attack or even skins! Try different skins – play an ordinary scarlet macaw, blue-and-gold macaw, red-and-green macaw or even blue-throated macaw!
Big city is full of dangers and a thrilling sensation for a sleek pet bird like a macaw parrot! But you’ve got a chance to make a real city bird from this bright tropical creature! Start your own city bir adventure with City Parrot Simulator 3D
City Parrot Simulator 3D features:
Unusual city bird survival simulator – rasie up ex-pet to the real cuty bird
Detailed big city streets, blocks, and roofs
Many predators – cats and eagles
Many other city birds as your oponents – pigeons, crows, and even seagulls
Ability to make nest and raise up little parrots
Check City Parrot Simulator 3D and enjoy the life of a macaw parrot that has successfully become a real city bird!
